overview: Chris Cope, a Florida transplant now living in Los Angeles. The city has been good to Chris in just 4 short years he's appeared on Jimmy Kimmel Live, Tosh.O, Laughs on Fox. He's acted in feature films and also appeared on the hit ABC TV Show "Grey's Anatomy". Chris can also be heard on Pandora, Spotify, and XM/Sirius Radio.  Currently has a new show on Amazon called Inside Joke With Asif Ali, as well as a few appearances as a judge on Netflix's Cooking On HIGH as most recently Chris Cope has appeared on TBS's THE CONAN O'BRIEN SHOW !!
title: Chris Cope: Baby Face
